sorcer.core.provider
Class ControlFlowManager

java.lang.Object
  sorcer.core.provider.ControlFlowManager

public class ControlFlowManager
extends Object

The ControlFlowManager class is responsible for handling control floe of conditional exertions (Conditional, IfExertion, WhileExertion). This class is used by the ServiceProvider class and ProviderDelegate for executing Exertion.

          ExertionDelegate reference needed for handling exertions.

Returns:
Exertion the result

doRendezvousExertion

public Exertion doRendezvousExertion(ServiceExertion xrt)
                              throws RemoteException,
                                     ExertionException
Selects a Jobber or Spacer for exertion processing. If own Jobber or Spacer is not available then fetches one and forwards the exertion for processing.

Parameters:
xrt - the exertion to be processed
Returns:
Throws:
RemoteException
ExertionException

doConditional

public Exertion doConditional(Exertion exertion)
This method handles the Conditional Exertions. It determines if the Conditional Exertion is a WhileExertion or a IfExertion.

Parameters:
exertion - Conditional type Exertion
Returns:
Exertion
See Also:
WhileExertion, IfExertion

doWhileExertion

protected Exertion doWhileExertion(Exertion exertion)
DoWhileExertion handles the execution of an WhileExertion. Checks if the inner Exertion is another type of WhileExertion, IfExertion, ServiceJob, or a ServiceTask.

Parameters:
exertion - The WhileExertion container
Returns:
Exertion the result is also a WhileExertion

doWhileTask

protected Exertion doWhileTask(Exertion exertion)
This method handles the elemental exertion as it's base exertion, a ServiceTask. It will loop the base Exertion untill the specified condition is satisfied.

Parameters:
exertion - a WhileExertion where the inner exertion is a task
Returns:
Exertion type of WhileExertion

doWhileJob

protected Exertion doWhileJob(Exertion exertion)
Execute the job in loop using the WhileExertion, until the specified condition is satisfied.

Parameters:
exertion - Exertion
Returns:
Exertion

doIfExertion

protected Exertion doIfExertion(Exertion exertion)
The doIfExertion handles the IfExertion. Checkes the condition and determines based on the isTrue() method wether to call on the thenExertion component or elseExertion component.

Parameters:
exertion - The WhileExertion container
Returns:
Exertion

doIfTask

protected Exertion doIfTask(Exertion exertion)
The doIfTask method handles the ServiceTask component.

Parameters:
exertion - The IfExertion container
Returns:
Exertion

doIfJob

protected Exertion doIfJob(Exertion exertion)
The doIfJob handles the ServiceJob component.

Exertion

public static void saveState(Map<String,Object> mapBackUp,
                             Context context)
This mehtod saves all the data nodes of a dataContext and put it on a Map.

Parameters:
mapBackUp - HashMap where the ServiceContext data nodes are saved
context - ServiceContext to be saved into the HashMap

restoreState

public static void restoreState(Map<String,Object> mapBackUp,
                                Context context)
Copies the backup map of the dataContext to the passed dataContext.

Parameters:
mapBackUp - Saved HashMap which is used to restore from
context - ServiceContext that gets restored from the saved HashMap
